summary: An email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York discussing a draft report from OPR (Office of Professional Responsibility) regarding the Epstein case. The sender notes technical issues with forwarding the report and asks if it can be shared with the team.

events.title: OPR Draft Report Received
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York receives a draft report from the Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) regarding the Epstein case.

keyFacts: A draft report from the Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) was received by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York on August 6, 2020.
The email indicates technical issues with forwarding the OPR report via Outlook.
The sender seeks permission to share the OPR draft report with their team.
The document shows internal communication within the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding the Epstein investigation.
